content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Electricity generator at position(117.5, -30.5)
Consists of steam engine(position 117.5, -30.5), boiler(position 111.5, -32.0) and offshore pump (position 107.5, -33.5)
- Boiler is connected to offshore pump via pipes at positions (107.5, -34.5), (108.5, -34.5), (109.5, -34.5), (109.5, -33.5), (109.5, -32.5), (109.5, -31.5)
- Steam engine is connected to boiler via pipes at positions (115.5, -33.5), (116.5, -33.5), (117.5, -33.5)

### Copper plate mine at position(62.0, -54.0)
Consists of following entities
- Furnace (position 62.0, -54.0)

### Copper cable factory
No entities found

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into boiler
- Make sure to have the required item in your inventory before attempting to insert it into the boiler
- Ensure that the boiler is not out of fuel before attempting to insert items

### Errors when using offshore pump
- Ensure that the offshore pump is connected to a pipe before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the pipe is not blocked or occupied by another entity

### Errors when using steam engine
- Ensure that the steam engine is connected to a boiler and a pipe before attempting to use it
- Make sure that the boiler is producing steam and the pipe is not blocked or occupied by another entity

### NAMESPACE
No utility functions defined by the agent.
Important variables assigned:
- `transport-belt`: 8
- `small-electric-pole`: 1
- `wood`: 7
- `iron-ore`: 10
- `copper-ore`: 10
- `iron-plate`: 7
- `copper-plate`: 5
- `copper-cable`: 2
- `iron-gear-wheel`: 2
